description:
Introducing Harmonyx.Net, a powerful and versatile library designed to enhance the flexibility of .NET and Mono applications by providing seamless runtime method patching, replacement, and decoration. This feature-rich library is empowered by the robust MonoMod framework, offering developers a dynamic toolkit for manipulating methods at runtime.
Key Features:
1. Dynamic Method Patching:

Effortlessly patch and modify methods in real-time without the need for recompilation. Harmonyx.Net allows developers to inject custom logic into existing methods, providing a flexible and agile approach to application modification.
2. Method Replacement:

Swap out methods with ease to tailor the behavior of your application on the fly. Whether you need to substitute a method with custom functionality or enhance existing logic, Harmonyx.Net simplifies the process of method replacement, enabling rapid iteration and experimentation.
3. Method Decoration:

Enhance the functionality of methods by adding supplementary logic or behavior without altering their original code. Harmonyx.Net facilitates the practice of method decoration, allowing developers to extend and enrich the behavior of methods during runtime.
4. Powered by MonoMod:

Harness the capabilities of MonoMod, a battle-tested and reliable framework, to underpin the runtime manipulation capabilities of Harmonyx.Net. Benefit from a well-established foundation that ensures stability, compatibility, and robust performance.
5. Cross-Platform Compatibility:

Enjoy the flexibility of Harmonyx.Net across both .NET and Mono environments. Whether your application runs on Windows, Linux, or macOS, Harmonyx.Net seamlessly integrates into your project, providing consistent and reliable runtime method manipulation.
6. Easy Integration:

Integrate Harmonyx.Net effortlessly into your project using NuGet, ensuring a smooth and streamlined development process. Leverage the power of runtime method manipulation without the hassle of complex setup procedures.
7. Comprehensive Documentation:

Accelerate your development with comprehensive documentation that guides you through the process of using Harmonyx.Net. Gain insights into best practices, examples, and advanced features to make the most out of runtime method manipulation.

Transform the way you approach .NET and Mono application development with Harmonyx.Net. Empower your projects with the flexibility and adaptability needed to meet evolving requirements and deliver exceptional user experiences.

Get started with Harmonyx.Net today and unlock a new dimension of runtime method manipulation in your .NET and Mono applications!
